titles.title: Glory Glory Glory To The Lamb

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Glory Glory Glory to the Lamb
Glory Glory Glory to the Lamb

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
For He is glorious
And worthy to be praised
The Lamb upon the throne
And unto Him
We lift our voice in praise
The Lamb upon the throne

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Worthy Worthy Worthy is the Lamb
Worthy Worthy Worthy is the Lamb

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
Holy Holy Holy is the Lamb
Holy Holy Holy is the Lamb
